qqq.consoleWelcome: The introductory message displayed upon application start
qqq.consoleExit: The exit message displayed upon application exit
qqq.consoleWikiLocation: An informational message requesting the wiki URL
qqq.consoleWikiLocationExample: An informational subtitle providing an example of a wellformed wiki URL
qqq.consoleWikiLocationPrompt: The prompt requiring user input for the URL
qqq.consoleSignin: An informational message indicating the user needs to sign in via bot password and username
qqq.consoleSigninUsernamePrompt: The prompt requiring user input for username
qqq.consoleSigninPasswordPrompt: The prompt requiring user input for bot password
qqq.consoleType: An informational message indicating the user needs to select an entries type
qqq.consoleTypeCategories: The option for category name input
qqq.consoleTypeLoose: The option for manual loose username input
qqq.consoleTypePrompt: The prompt requiring user input for type selection
qqq.consoleEntries: An informational message indicating the user needs to input category names or usernames
qqq.consoleEntriesPrompt: The prompt requiring user input for entries
qqq.consoleMessage: An informational message indicating the user needs to input a message title and wikitext message body
qqq.consoleMessageTitlePrompt: The prompt requiring user input for message title
qqq.consoleMessageBodyPrompt: The prompt requiring user input for message body
qqq.successMessage: A success status message indicating the user denoted by $1 was messaged
qqq.successComplete: A success status message indicating that all operations have completed
qqq.errorLogin: An error status message indicating that the application was unable to login with the supplied credentials
qqq.errorNonexistentWiki: An error status message indicating that the application was unable to locate the API, indicating a nonexistent wiki
qqq.errorAPI: An error status message indicating that the application was unable successfully query the API
qqq.errorInsufficientPermissions: An error status message indicating that the user lacks the permissions to use the application
qqq.errorWikiLocation: An error status message indicating that the provided wiki URL was not correctly formatted
qqq.errorTypeInvalid: An error status message indicating that an invalid type selection was made
qqq.errorNoValidUsernames: An error status message indicating that no valid loose usernames were included in input
qqq.errorNoCategoryMembers: An error status message indicating that no valid category names were included in input
qqq.errorEditInterval: An error status message indicating that an edit interval could not be obtained from the API and that a default was applied
qqq.errorMessageTitleMissing: An error status message indicating that the required message title could not be found
qqq.errorMessageStd: An error status message indicating that the user denoted by $1 could not be messaged
qqq.errorMessageAPI: An error status message indicating that the user denoted by $1 could not be messaged due to API query problems

en.consoleWikiLocation: Please include the wiki's full base address
en.consoleEntries: Please input entries separated by commas
en.consoleMessage: Please input your message title and body (Notes: Title is required and body may use wikitext)
en.errorLogin: Error: Unable to login using these credentials. Please try again
en.errorNonexistentWiki: Error: A problem was encountered connecting to this wiki's API
en.errorAPI: Error: A problem was encountered connecting to and querying the API
en.errorInsufficientPermissions: Error: User account lacks sufficient user rights on this wiki
en.errorWikiLocation: Error: Invalid URL. URL must include schema and domain must be "fandom.com" or "wikia.org"
en.errorNoValidUsernames: Error: No valid usernames found in input
en.errorNoCategoryMembers: Error: A problem was encountered with input categories
en.errorEditInterval: Error: A problem was encountered retrieving an edit interval from the API. Default value has been applied
en.errorMessageTitleMissing: Error: Message title attribute is required
en.errorMessageAPI: Error: Unable to message $1 due to API query problems
